title: Rogel members present at upcoming AACR meeting
description: More than 40 Rogel Cancer Center-led research efforts will be presented during the AACR Annual Meeting 2022, which runs April 8-13 at the Ernest N. Morial Convention Center in New Orleans, Louisiana, and online.
sitename: Rogel Cancer Center | University of Michigan
cleaned_text: Rogel members present at upcoming AACR meeting Media contact: [Anna Megdell](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#8de0e8eae9e8e1e1eccde0e8e9a3f8e0e4eee5a3e8e9f8), [734-764-2220](tel:734-764-2220) More than 40 Rogel Cancer Center-led research efforts will be presented during the AACR Annual Meeting 2022, which runs April 8-13 at the Ernest N. Morial Convention Center in New Orleans, Louisiana, and online. You can help amplify the reach and impact of your colleagues' work by tweeting using #AACR22 and tagging [@UMRogelCancer](https://twitter.com/UMRogelCancer). Presenter information is sometimes incomplete. If your session is missing, please email the abstract link to [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#c7a4a6a9a4a2b5eaa9a2b0b487b2aaaea4afe9a2a3b2)..
